DESCRIPTION: Your next #yBlock gaining card gains additional #yBlock.
Exposed creatures take more damage from Attacks this turn.
Staggered creatures deal less damage with Attacks this turn.
Place a card on top of your draw pile.
Right Click to #rExhaust this card and trigger an effect.
When you obtain #b10 #yFervor, your next #yAttack deals double damage.
Whenever you play a card with #yCarrots, gain equal #yFervor.
#yBleeding creatures lose HP whenever they attack.
#yLeeched creatures lose HP at the start of their next turn and grant #yTemporary #yHP to the player.
A #yPerfect card cannot be #yUpgraded.
The next single target Attack you play hits ALL enemies.

Creatures take #b10% more damage from Attacks per #yToxin. Each turn, #yToxin is reduced by #b1.
When a creature receives #b3 #yResonance, it takes #b30 damage.
Locks a creature's intent.
Whenever you play another card this turn, play a copy of this card. Cards played this way do not trigger #yMind-Meld.
Next turn, move this card from your discard pile into your hand.
#yBurned creatures lose HP at the start of their turn. Each turn, #yBurned is reduced by #b1. Whenever a card is #yExhausted, #yBurned is increased by #b1.
Look at random cards in your draw pile. You may add one of them to your #yDiscovery pile. Cards in your #yDiscovery pile are added to your hand next turn.
